-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Visualize live Haskell data structures using vacuum, graphviz and cairo
--   
--   Visualize live Haskell data structures using vacuum, graphviz and
--   cairo
--   
--   <pre>
--   $ view "hello"
--   </pre>
--   
--   <a>http://code.haskell.org/~dons/images/vacuum/hello.png</a>
--   
--   <pre>
--   $ view [1..5]
--   </pre>
--   
--   <a>http://code.haskell.org/~dons/images/vacuum/list.png</a>
--   
--   <pre>
--   $ view (IntMap.fromList $ zip [1..10] [1..])
--   </pre>
--   
--   <a>http://code.haskell.org/~dons/images/vacuum/intmap.png</a>
@package vacuum-cairo
@version 0.5


-- | Interactively visualize Haskell heap values as SVG graphs in a Cairo
--   canvas using graphviz.
--   
--   <pre>
--   view [1..10]
--   </pre>
--   
--   Will display a pop-up window of the data structure produced
module System.Vacuum.Cairo

-- | Render a value using the current session
view :: a -> IO ()

-- | Render a value to a file
viewFile :: String -> a -> IO ()
instance NFData Session
